modName: Hardcore Vampiris Sanguinare - Struggle to Survive
summary: Ever find it too easy to become a Vampire? Very simple mod that adds a poison damage (6, 8, 10, 20) per second and 30% slow during the 3 days before transformation. Choose the damage you desire and only install one.
descriptionHtml:
Becoming a vampire in Skyrim is way too easy! With mods that overhaul vampires like BV/Sacro/Thirst etc. It is pretty shocking how easily you can unlock these powers on a new character. What I have done is introduced 2 negative effects to the Vampiris Sanguinaire disease. Movement speed will be slowed by 30%, and you will take damage per second, few different options for damage to suit your difficulty/desire in the file, only install one. Now you will struggle to survive the 3 day journey to becoming a Vampire. Recommend a whole lot of healing potions and anything that can help you stave off the damage, it's gonna be a rough few nights, and if you fast travel, you probably won't make it to destination unless you are high level and fairly strong.

To install just slap ONE of these into data folder. Requires Dawnguard (Because of the trap effect).

Hardcore Vampiris - Easy.esp - 6 damage per second + 30% slow
Hardcore Vampiris - Normal.esp - 8 damage per second + 30% slow
Hardcore Vampiris - Hard.esp - 12 damage per second + 30% slow
Hardcore Vampiris - Insane.esp - 20 damage per second + 30%slow (Only for OP characters, this will kick your butt!)


Compatability

Works with anything that does not alter the Vampiris Sanguinaire disease effects. Better Vampires is compatible, as I actually use it. Should be compatible with the others too. Just adds 2 effects to Vampiris Sanguinaire and does not at all interfere with the actual transformation/quest or Vampirism itself.

Uninstall

Just remove the esp, no scripts or anything fancy, very easy to remove if you dislike it.
